term.title: scaler

item.text: A sub-assembly for counting electrical pulses and containing one or more scaling circuits.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1551 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
